name: peachick
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young peacock (= a large bird, the male of which has very long tail feathers that it can spread out to show bright colours and patterns shaped like eyes): They own peacocks and have raised peachicks for many years.
Andrew Dernie/ The Image Bank/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe peachick was very weak and didn't survive.How do you tell a male peachick from a female peachick?Peachicks seem to favour big fluffy nests.Until peacocks are one year old they are referred to as peachicks.
